SEARCH
程序包 src.main.java.Login_story1_3

类 LayoutController

java.lang.Object
src.main.java.Login_story1_3.LayoutController
public class LayoutController extends Object
Title : LayoutController.java Description: Controller for the main application layout (Story 1–3). Manages navigation between views by loading FXML into the content pane, updates the section title, displays the current user's name, handles VIP-only access for AI Forecast, logout functionality, and integrates HostServices for external links.

  • 方法详细资料

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Called by FXMLLoader after fields are injected. Sets the username label from Session, schedules initial dashboard load, and prepares responsive scaling (if enabled).

    • adjustScale

      private void adjustScale()
      Adjusts the scale transform to fit cardContainer inside cardWrapper. Calculates scale factors based on their widths and heights.

    • onDashboard

      private void onDashboard()
      Loads the dashboard view into the content pane.

    • onUserInfo

      private void onUserInfo(javafx.event.ActionEvent e)
      Loads the user management view into the content pane.
      参数:
      e - the action event triggering this method

    • onVipCenter

      private void onVipCenter(javafx.event.ActionEvent e)
      Loads the membership center view into the content pane.
      参数:
      e - the action event triggering this method

    • onCharts

      private void onCharts(javafx.event.ActionEvent e)
      Loads the financial charts view into the content pane.
      参数:
      e - the action event triggering this method

    • onCards

      private void onCards(javafx.event.ActionEvent e)
      Loads the card management view into the content pane.
      参数:
      e - the action event triggering this method

    • onTransaction

      private void onTransaction(javafx.event.ActionEvent e)
      Loads the transaction view into the content pane.
      参数:
      e - the action event triggering this method

    • onAIForecast

      private void onAIForecast(javafx.event.ActionEvent e)
      Attempts to load the AI Forecast view; only available to VIP users. Shows an error if the current user is not VIP.
      参数:
      e - the action event triggering this method

    • onNotification

      private void onNotification()
      Loads the notification (reminder) view into the content pane.

    • onVisitSite

      private void onVisitSite()
      Opens the project GitHub page in the default browser.

    • onLogout

      private void onLogout(javafx.event.ActionEvent e)
      Logs out the current user by clearing the session nickname, then loads the login view to replace the current scene.
      参数:
      e - the action event triggering logout

    • isCurrentUserVIP

      private boolean isCurrentUserVIP()
      Checks if the current session user has VIP status by reading data/user.csv.
      返回:
      true if the user is VIP; false otherwise

    • showError

      private void showError(String msg)
      Displays an error alert with the given message.
      参数:
      msg - the error message to show

    • setHostServices

      public void setHostServices(javafx.application.HostServices services)
      Sets the HostServices instance for this controller, allowing it to open external links.
      参数:
      services - the HostServices to use

    • loadView

      private void loadView(String fxmlPath, String title)
      Loads the specified FXML into the content pane and updates the section title.
      参数:
      fxmlPath - the path to the FXML resource
      title - the title to display in the section header
